function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of hygienic flooring materials such as wood, bamboo, and cork may not be effective in preventing virus spread in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of viral contamination and transmission within indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Consider additional sanitation measures and disinfection protocols to complement the hygienic flooring","Technologies":"Ultraviolet Radiation, Germicidal ultraviolet (GUV)","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and architects"},{"Description":"Direct exposure to UV rays from germicidal sources can be harmful to human eyes and skin","Impact":"Risk of eye and skin damage from UV radiation","Mitigation":"Implementation of upper-room ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) technology to avoid direct exposure to UV rays","Technologies":"Upper-room ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI)","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and architects"},{"Description":"Insufficient disinfection of air and surfaces in indoor environments may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and contamination within indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Utilization of germicidal sources and technologies for effective disinfection, alongside other sanitation measures","Technologies":"Germicidal ultraviolet (GUV), Solar paint for improved indoor air quality, Hygienic flooring materials","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and architects"}]}
